entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as fighting with wizards surrounding him. He roared at Dawlish and lifted a man bodily from the ground.

entities.name: dawlish
entities.description: Dawlish is mentioned as being yelled at by Hagrid.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as attempting to defend Hagrid and leaping at the wizards surrounding him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as looking scared when seeing Hagrid in a real temper.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione gasped at the sight of Hagrid throwing a man.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as pointing to the front doors of the castle that opened again.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Dawlish are arguing, with Hagrid yelling at Dawlish.
Fang is attempting to defend Hagrid from the wizards surrounding him.
Ron looks scared when seeing Hagrid in a real temper.
Hermione gasps at the sight of Hagrid throwing a man.
Parvati is pointing to the front doors of the castle that opened again.
